scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development docker-compose --env-file .env.local --env-file .env.development -p auth-bun-dev -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up --build
scripts.staging: NODE_ENV=production docker-compose --env-file .env.production -p auth-bun-staging -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.staging.yml up --build -d
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production docker-compose --env-file .env.production -p auth-bun-prod -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build -d
scripts.test:e2e: bun run migrate:test && NODE_ENV=test docker-compose --env-file .env.test -p auth-bun-test -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml up --build --exit-code-from app --abort-on-container-exit
scripts.migrate:dev: NODE_ENV=development docker-compose --env-file .env.local --env-file .env.development -p auth-bun-dev --profile migrations -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml run --rm migrate
scripts.migrate:test: NODE_ENV=test docker-compose --env-file .env.test -p auth-bun-test --profile migrations -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm migrate
scripts.migrate:staging: NODE_ENV=production docker-compose --env-file .env.production -p auth-bun-staging --profile migrations -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.staging.yml run --rm migrate
scripts.migrate:prod: NODE_ENV=production docker-compose --env-file .env.production -p auth-bun-prod --profile migrations -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml run --rm migrate
